FvttPartyResources.Dashboard.BlankWarnin: Resource blocks will appear here once they're added.
FvttPartyResources.FirstTimeNotification:
Welcome to Party Resources v{version}!
This is the first time you're using this module.
{anchor} to be guided to the resources dashboard.
FvttPartyResources.ResourceForm.AllowPla: Allow players to modify configuration settings
FvttPartyResources.ResourceForm.Identifi: The identifier that represents this resource in API requests. Should not contain spaces or numbers, and should be lowercase.
FvttPartyResources.ResourceForm.MaxValue: When this (optional) integer is provided, you won't be able to increase the resource's value above the given number.
FvttPartyResources.ResourceForm.MinValue: When this (optional) integer is provided, you won't be able to lower the resource's value below the given number.
FvttPartyResources.ResourceForm.Name: Resource name
FvttPartyResources.ResourceForm.NameHint: The name shown in the resource dashboard.
FvttPartyResources.ResourceForm.NotifyCh: This sends a chat message when resource values change.
FvttPartyResources.ResourceForm.PlayerMa: Allow players to manage this resource.
Toggling this will allow players to change the value of this resource.
This checkbox can only be enabled by giving players explicit permission to modify configuration settings.
FvttPartyResources.GMSettingsForm.ShowAc: When this is left unchecked, players will no longer see the Party Resources button at the top of the Actors Directory. Only the GM will be able to see and use it.
FvttPartyResources.Title: Party Resources
